name: OpenClinic
headline: Digital healthcare clinics that are 99% AI, 1% doctor.
description: OpenClinic is a platform that makes it easy for any doctor or hospital to open their own digital clinic. Our AI assistant takes a comprehensive medical history using an empathic voice-based interface, uses sophisticated medical reasoning to narrow down likely diagnoses, and produces evidence-based treatment suggestions for each patient. Licensed doctors then review the text-based summaries of the cases our AI provides, and choose how to manage the patients. In this fashion, we're able to deliver end-to-end healthcare where AI manages 99%, and doctors do the final high value 1%.

founders.name: Riyan Moussaoui, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder @ OpenClinic  |  
Medical Doctor // Prev. Senior AI engineer at Anterior automating prior auth.

founders.name: Nabil Belahouane, Co-Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CTO @ OpenClinic

Passionate about improving health outcomes through technology.

Previously, Platform and Data Engineer at GoCardless, where I helped scale and optimise infrastructure for one of the UK’s leading FinTechs. Founding engineer at Documatic, driving the creation of incident prevention tooling for Fortune 500 companies.

founders.name: Usama Syed, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder @ OpenClinic

| Building the future of healthcare with OpenClinic (YC F24). Digital medical clinics that are 99% AI, 1% doctor |

Medical and business school graduate from Imperial College London, board-certified dermatologist, and faculty member at Mount Sinai, NYC. Medical content creator with 300,000+ followers across YouTube, Instagram, and X, and built an AI-powered skincare database providing personalized skin advice (www.heystratum.com).

# c
Start a Digital clinic
all from your phone
[Doctor Sign-Up](https://www.openclinic.com/</sign-up>)
Our AI platform handles 99% of medical history taking, diagnostic triaging, and even offers guideline-based treatment suggestions for each patient that comes to your OpenClinic.
You review text-based summaries and focus only on the final medical decision making, allowing you to safely see patients in a fraction of the time while getting instant cash payments. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/67293107bc79ccdb80ec06aa_tl_panel.png)
# Made ByDoctors
For Doctors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/6729263efef8dced38afc58e_tr_panel.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/6729263e498fcb52908157d0_bl_panel.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/672924e04e2c74b33c9a5094_oc_panel.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/6729263e2e4eb58365193186_br_panel.png)
# Made byDoctors
For Doctors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/672924e04e2c74b33c9a5094_oc_panel.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/6729263e498fcb52908157d0_bl_panel.png)
Who we are
3 out of our 4 co-founders are medical doctors from the US and the UK.
Having seen >10,000 real world patients between us, we truly understand what doctors need to bring joy back to their professional careers.
A new model of healthcare
For too long, technology has been made ‘for doctors’ without ever truly understanding our needs, often making our lives more difficult. 
We need a way to practice that gives us flexibility, safety in delivering patient care, and true ownership of our careers.
![Asterisk](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/6727f965f702337c9eec76cf_Asterisk.svg)
## Medical histories still take time, just not yours
our AI assistant takes a detailed medical history from your patients, whilst looking ahead for differential diagnoses.
## Empathetic Voice Interface
More than just a basic intake form. Your AI assistant takes a detailed medical history from your patients as a natural conversation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/6731e905db7ffdc0013c5c65_microphone-light.png)
## Minimizing the back and forth
Our models are trained with sophisticated medical reasoning to not only narrow differential diagnoses, but also to ask the right questions during history taking to set up your treatment decision.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/6731e905ac4730fad710aef4_triage%20light.png)
## Howit works
An asynchronous platform to deliver care to patients. No video visits, no phone calls.
Patient presents their history to your AI assistant.
Our AI voice assistant takes unhurried, empathetic medical histories from your patients through natural conversation.Using sophisticated medical reasoning, it asks targeted questions to guide diagnosis and inform treatment decisions.
Safety and Suitability
We ask comprehensive safety questions based on potential diagnoses to identify any risks or contraindications.Cases are only routed to doctors when they're confirmed suitable for virtual care, ensuring appropriate treatment paths.
Medical Decision Making
Here's where you come in. Make confident clinical decisions with pre-organized cases and smart tooling at your fingertips. Review key findings with transcript citations and efficiently approve or customize treatment plans.
Get Paid Immediately
We operate on a self-pay basis, making payments for your medical expertise simple and direct.
Focus on providing your medical expertise.Nothing else.
## Safety
OpenClinic is built from the ground up with patient safety as the top priority.
## first, second, 
## and third
# Safety by Design
[contact@colours.com![Copy Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/6727f965f702337c9eec7715_Copy%20Icon.svg)](https://www.openclinic.com/<#>)
Every interaction is built with multiple safety checkpoints. From comprehensive medical histories to patient-verified case summaries, we've reimagined clinical safety for the digital age.
# TreatmentCo-Pilot
[contact@colours.com![Copy Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6727f965f702337c9eec7609/6727f965f702337c9eec7715_Copy%20Icon.svg)](https://www.openclinic.com/<#>)
Our treatment suggestions are derived from the latest medical guidelines and are updated constantly, but they are only ever suggestions. All care provided is solely down to the discretion of licensed doctors in good standing with the legal right to provide it.
## The new healthcare model

generated_description:
### OpenClinic: Redefining Digital Healthcare

**Founded:** 2024  
**Location:** San Francisco, California  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** F24  
**Website:** [OpenClinic](https://www.openclinic.com)

#### Mission
At OpenClinic, the goal is straightforward yet revolutionary: empower healthcare through AI. They operate with a structure that's 99% AI and just 1% doctor, streamlining the healthcare delivery model so physicians can focus on high-value care while technology handles the routine tasks.

#### How It Works
OpenClinic provides a digital platform that allows any medical professional or institution to launch their own virtual clinic. The AI assistant conducts initial consultations by collecting detailed medical histories using a voice-based, empathetic interface. It evaluates symptoms and suggests likely diagnoses, while licensed doctors review AI-generated summaries to make informed decisions about patient care. 

This unique blend enables doctors to see more patients efficiently—just imagine cutting the tedious paperwork down to a page or two, while providing better care based on evidence-based treatment suggestions.

#### Benefits
1. **Empathy at Scale:** The AI doesn't just take notes; it engages patients in natural conversations, making history-taking feel more personal and less mechanical.
2. **Safety Checks:** Safety is paramount at OpenClinic. Their system includes several checkpoints to ensure that cases are suitable for virtual care before being routed to physicians. 
3. **Faster Payments:** Transactions are simplified: doctors receive payments immediately for their services, allowing them to focus entirely on patient care.
4. **Support from Doctors:** Three of the four co-founders are practicing medical doctors. This insider expertise means that OpenClinic isn't just tech for tech's sake; it's designed with real doctor needs in mind.

#### The Team
OpenClinic is led by a small but skilled team, with David Lieb serving as the Group Partner. Their collective experience numbers over 10,000 patient interactions, which directly informs the product's design.

#### Conclusion
OpenClinic is not just another health-tech startup; it’s a rethinking of how healthcare can be delivered in the digital age. By minimizing the administrative load through AI, they enable doctors to reclaim their time and joy in practice. If you’re looking for a way to start or streamline a digital clinic, OpenClinic stands eager to help.

For more information, visit [OpenClinic](https://www.openclinic.com) and see how you can join the future of healthcare.
